mapper.insert: insert into tbl_src (src_id, src_path, src_writer, src_comments, src_title, src_status) values(#{srcId}, #{srcPath}, #{srcWriter}, #{srcComments}, #{srcTitle}, #{srcStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT src.src_id srcId, src.src_writer srcWriter, src.src_path srcPath, src.src_comments srcComments, src.src_regdate srcRegdate, src.src_update srcUpdate, src.src_title srcTitle, src.src_likecnt srcLikecnt, src.src_viewcnt srcViewcnt, src.src_status srcStatus FROM tbl_src src WHERE src_id = #{srcId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_src SET src_comments = #{srcComments}, src_title = #{srcTitle}, src_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, src_status = #{srcStatus} WHERE src_id = #{srcId}
